About us

Bestchill Inc. was established in 2018 and is located at W6 Maclane Storage Facilities, Ilaya St., Niog II, Cavite. The company specializes in cooling solutions, starting with Reefer Vans and their refrigeration systems for the safe transport of fresh and frozen goods. In 2019, Bestchill expanded its product line to include Portable Parking Cooler Air Conditioners, designed to provide comfort for truck drivers during rest periods. Responding to the rising demand for outdoor leisure in 2022, the company introduced its latest innovation â€” Camping Tents with Portable Air Conditioning, offering a more comfortable camping experience.

); }
